title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 204 - New York State Apple Research And Development Program
content:

State Regulations
§ 204.1 - Definition
§ 204.2 - Program area
§ 204.3 - Establishment and members of advisory board
§ 204.4 - Nominations for advisory board membership
§ 204.5 - Acceptance and terms of office
§ 204.6 - Duties and responsibilities of the advisory board
§ 204.7 - Research
§ 204.8 - Informational services
§ 204.9 - Budget and assessment
§ 204.10 - Collection of assessment
§ 204.11 - Disbursement of funds
§ 204.12 - Termination and periodic referendum
§ 204.13 - Effective date
§ 204.14 to 204.15 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 204

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 18[6], 294; art. 25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
